communication
Class MapTask

java.lang.Object
  interfaces.Task
      communication.MapTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MapTask
extends Task
implements java.io.Serializable

A class that represents all information needed to carry out a map task by a worker node. This class is serializable

See Also:
